item.title: Danny add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "A thinker sees his own actions as experiments and questions--as attempts to find out something. Success and failure are for him answers above all." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Danny add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Danny add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Danny add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Danny add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Danny add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Danny add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Danny add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Danny add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Danny add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "God has no religion." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Danny add a quote by Plato
item.description: "The price good men pay for indifference to public affairs is to be ruled by evil men." -- Plato

item.title: Danny add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Danny add a quote by Daniel J. Boorstin
item.description: "The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge." -- Daniel J. Boorstin

item.title: Danny add a quote by Jerry Scott
item.description: "I totally carpe-d the snot out of this diem!" -- Jerry Scott
